title: Baseball Data - MLB - Mini Scoreboard - 9/25/2020-9/27/2020 MLB Schedule
custom_steps: WHEN user executes a GET request to https://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/schedule?sportId=1&startDate=2020-09-25&endDate=2020-09-27&gameType=E&&gameType=S&&gameType=R&&gameType=F&&gameType=D&&gameType=L&&gameType=W&&gameType=A&season=2020&hydrate=team(leaders(showOnPreview(leaderCategories=%5BhomeRuns,runsBattedIn,battingAverage%5D,statGroup=%5Bpitching,hitting%5D))),linescore(matchup,runners),flags,liveLookin,review,broadcasts(all),venue(location),decisions,person,probablePitcher,stats,homeRuns,previousPlay,game(content(media(featured,epg),summary),tickets),seriesStatus(useOverride=true)&language=en&leagueId=103&&leagueId=104
custom_expected: THEN the returned JSON object adheres to the Pact.IO consumer contract

title: Baseball Data - MLB - Mini Scoreboard - 2020 Postseason Schedule
custom_steps: WHEN user executes a GET request to https://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/schedule/postseason/series?sportId=1&season=2020&hydrate=seriesStatus(useOverride=true)
custom_expected: THEN the returned JSON object adheres to the Pact.IO consumer contract
